sections.heading: to suppress; filing; time; failure to file; effect; exception
sections.text: Any person aggrieved by an unlawful search and seizure may move for return of the property so seized and to suppress its use as evidence. The motion shall be filed in the district court where a felony is charged and may be made at any tim

sections.heading: that motions to suppress evidence be determined before trial, but trial court be not precluded from correcting errors at trial
